articles.author: Lorenzo Bettoni
articles.title: EURO 2024: Italy vs Albania – probable line-ups and where to watch - Football Italia
articles.description: Riccardo Calafiori, Federico Chiesa, and Gianluca Scamacca will start in Italy's 4-2-3-1 system against an Albanian side filled with Serie A players.
articles.content:
Riccardo Calafiori, Federico Chiesa, and Gianluca Scamacca will start in Italys 4-2-3-1 system against an Albanian side filled with Serie A players.
